summary: This document is a subpoena issued by the FBI to AT&T/Cingular Wireless for subscriber and billing records related to a federal criminal investigation. It outlines the specific information requested and emphasizes the confidentiality of the subpoena to avoid interference with the ongoing investigation.

persons.name: El jaRib Ortiz
persons.context: El jaRib Ortiz is the individual who issued the subpoena to AT&T for subscriber information related to an ongoing investigation.

events.title: Subpoena Compliance Deadline
events.description: AT&T is required to comply with the subpoena by providing the requested subscriber and billing information by this date.

locations: 801 Northpoint Parkway, West Palm Beach, FL 33407
505 S. Flagler Drive, #500, West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: The subpoena was issued as part of a federal criminal investigation being conducted by the FBI.
AT&T was commanded to provide subscriber and billing records for specific dates.
The document emphasizes the confidentiality of the subpoena to prevent disclosure that could interfere with the investigation.
The subpoena includes specific instructions for compliance, including a deadline for submission of records.
The document contains personal information about a subscriber, including their address and identification details.
